name: unlock-pro
description: Unlocks all pro features.

name: tiktok-ads
description: Removes ads from TikTok.

name: tiktok-speed
description: Enables the playback speed option for all videos.

name: tiktok-download
description: Removes download restrictions and changes the default path to download to.

name: tiktok-seekbar
description: Show progress bar for all video.

name: settings
description: Adds settings for ReVanced to TikTok.

name: tiktok-force-login
description: Do not force login.

name: tiktok-feed-filter
description: Filters tiktok videos: removing ads, removing livestreams.

name: timeline-ads
description: Removes ads from the Twitter timeline.

name: dynamic-color
description: Replaces the default Twitter Blue with the users Material You palette.

name: monochrome-icon
description: Adds a monochrome icon.

name: promo-code-unlock
description: Disables the validation of promo code. Any code will work to unlock all features.

name: disable-ads
description: Disables ads in HexEditor.

name: spotify-theme
description: Applies a custom theme.

options.title: Background color
options.description: The background color. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Accent color
options.description: The accent color ('spotify green' by default). Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Pressed accent for the dark theme
options.description: The color when accented buttons are pressed, by default slightly darker than accent. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

name: disable-capture-restriction
description: Allows capturing Spotify's audio output while screen sharing or screen recording.

name: hide-premium-navbar
description: Removes the premium tab from the navbar.

name: hide-crowdfunding-box
description: Hides the crowdfunding box between the player and video description.

name: hide-time-and-seekbar
description: Hides progress bar and time counter on videos.

name: hide-video-buttons
description: Adds options to hide action buttons under a video.

name: enable-wide-searchbar
description: Replaces the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.

name: hide-captions-button
description: Hides the captions button on video player.

name: hide-shorts-button
description: Hides the shorts button on the navigation bar.

name: hide-create-button
description: Hides the create button in the navigation bar.

name: disable-startup-shorts-player
description: Disables playing YouTube Shorts when launching YouTube.

name: hide-endscreen-cards
description: Hides the suggested video cards at the end of a video in fullscreen.

name: hide-cast-button
description: Hides the cast button in the video player.

name: sponsorblock
description: Integrate SponsorBlock.

name: hide-autoplay-button
description: Hides the autoplay button in the video player.

name: hide-watch-in-vr
description: Hides the Watch in VR option from the player settings flyout panel.

name: hide-album-cards
description: Hides the album cards below the artist description.

name: disable-auto-player-popup-panels
description: Disable automatic popup panels (playlist or live chat) on video player.

name: disable-auto-captions
description: Disable forced captions from being automatically enabled.

name: disable-fullscreen-panels
description: Disables video description and comments panel in fullscreen view.

name: hide-artist-card
description: Hides the artist card below the searchbar.

name: return-youtube-dislike
description: Shows the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: comments
description: Hides components related to comments.

name: theme
description: Applies a custom theme.

options.title: Background color for the dark theme
options.description: The background color of the dark theme. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Background color for the light theme
options.description: The background color of the light theme. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

name: hide-email-address
description: Hides the email address in the account switcher.

name: tablet-mini-player
description: Enables the tablet mini player layout.

name: hide-watermark
description: Hides creator's watermarks on videos.

name: hide-info-cards
description: Hides info-cards in videos.

name: hide-my-mix
description: Hides mix playlists.

name: custom-branding
description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon and name to your choice (defaults to ReVanced).

options.title: Application Name
options.description: The name of the application it will show on your home screen.

options.title: App Icon Path
options.description: A path containing mipmap resource folders with icons.

name: premium-heading
description: Shows premium branding on the home screen.

name: old-quality-layout
description: Enables the original quality flyout menu.

name: general-ads
description: Removes general ads.

name: video-ads
description: Removes ads in the video player.

name: swipe-controls
description: Adds volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: downloads
description: Enables downloading music and videos from YouTube.

name: seekbar-tapping
description: Enables tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

name: disable-zoom-haptics
description: Disables haptics when zooming.

name: settings
description: Adds settings for ReVanced to YouTube.

name: open-links-directly
description: Bypasses redirect links and allows opening links directly.

name: microg-support
description: Allows YouTube ReVanced to run without root and under a different package name with Vanced MicroG.

name: custom-video-buffer
description: Lets you change the buffers of videos.

name: debugging
description: Adds debugging options.

options.title: App debugging
options.description: Whether to make the app debuggable on Android.

name: client-spoof
description: Spoofs the YouTube or Vanced client to prevent playback issues.

name: always-autorepeat
description: Always repeats the playing video again.

name: minimized-playback
description: Enables minimized and background playback.

name: custom-video-speed
description: Adds more video speed options.

options.title: Video speed granularity
options.description: The granularity of the video speeds. The higher the value, the more speeds will be available.

options.title: Maximum video speed
options.description: The maximum video speed. Must be greater than the minimum video speed and smaller than 5.

name: remember-video-quality
description: Adds the ability to remember the video quality you chose in the video quality flyout.

name: hdr-auto-brightness
description: Makes the brightness of HDR videos follow the system default.

name: unlock-themes
description: Unlocks all themes.

name: unlock-premium
description: Unlocks all premium features.

name: debug-mode
description: Enables Twitch's internal debugging mode.

name: block-audio-ads
description: Blocks audio ads in streams and VODs.

name: block-video-ads
description: Blocks video ads in streams and VODs.

name: show-deleted-messages
description: Shows deleted chat messages behind a clickable spoiler.

name: pflotsh-ecmwf-subscription-unlock
description: Unlocks all subscription features.

name: tasteBuilder-remover
description: Removes the "Tell us which artists you like" card from the home screen.

name: hide-get-premium
description: Removes all "Get Premium" evidences from the avatar menu.

name: minimized-playback-music
description: Enables minimized playback on Kids music.

name: compact-header
description: Hides the music category bar at the top of the homepage.

name: upgrade-button-remover
description: Removes the upgrade tab from the pivot bar.

name: music-video-ads
description: Removes ads in the music player.

name: background-play
description: Enables playing music in the background.

name: exclusive-audio-playback
description: Enables the option to play music without video.

name: codecs-unlock
description: Adds more audio codec options. The new audio codecs usually result in better audio quality.

name: music-microg-support
description: Allows YouTube Music ReVanced to run without root and under a different package name.

name: premium-icon-reddit
description: Unlocks premium Reddit app icons.

name: general-reddit-ads
description: Removes general ads from the Reddit frontpage and subreddits.

name: unlock-pro
description: Unlocks all pro features.
